findings.title: Unrestricted Token Burning
findings.description: The owner can burn any user addressâ€™s tokens, which may not provide true freedom to users to use or hold their tokens.
findings.location: `burn` function in the K-Root Token smart contract

findings.title: Unvalidated New Owner Address
findings.description: Missing check for the new owner address, which can create serious issues if a wrong address is passed.
findings.location: `changeOwnership` function in the K-Root Token smart contract

findings.title: Inefficient Code
findings.description: Using onlyOwner modifier can optimize code and reduce gas usage.
findings.location: `mint` and `burn` functions in the K-Root Token smart contract

findings.title: Unnecessary Variable Usage
findings.description: The use of an extra variable can be avoided.
findings.location: `_burn` function in the K-Root Token smart contract
